problem: Develop a feature-rich Discord music bot (ZMusic) focused on YouTube playback (audio/video), with dual command interfaces (prefix/slash) and a persistent interactive player message including a live progress bar.
context: The bot requires asyncio, discord.py (v2+), yt-dlp, ffmpeg. Key features include queue management (save/load/import/export), permissions (DJ mode), vote-skip, effects, search, stage channel support, idle disconnect, and robust error handling. A major challenge is the live-updating progress bar in the interactive player, requiring careful background task management to avoid rate limits.
